|brand = AirTies |model = Air 2410 |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = March 1, 2012 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/AirTies_Air_2410 |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Male A |formfactor = dongle

|chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4323; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== There may be multiple versions of this device. :Both appear to use Broadcom chipsets, both may be BCM4323 :One may have the USB ID of 1eda:2410. :The driver available on the AirTies site is for v2.
Various adapters use the same chip as this one, but this one also shares its VID and PID with the following models: *AzureWave AW-NU231 *Toshiba WLM-10UB1 *Sharp WN8522B
The VID+PID used is presumed to be the default BCM4323 USB ID.
From the picture, the device is likely an [[Arcadyan WN8522B]] (some shots are viewable at [[Toshiba WLM-10UB1]]).
[[Category:English Documentation]]
